entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 09:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
